resources.string: Midas allows you to create virtual cards that can be used online to make purchases and complete payments

Add money to your card easily using various methods like mobile money transfer
Cards created with Midas can be used on over 100 platforms and websites

But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness. No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful. Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure. To take a trivial example, which of us ever undertakes laborious physical exercise, except to obtain some advantage from it? But who has any right to find fault with a man who chooses to enjoy a pleasure that has no annoying consequences, or one who avoids a pain that produces no resultant pleasure?

1. What is a virtual credit card?

To get started with Midas you first need to create an account and make sure it is verified. After that simply navigate to the cards section using the bottom navigation and click on create card. Select the type of card you want to create and follow the prompt.

A virtual credit card is basically the same as its traditional physical counterpart; it has a 16-digit code, CVV, and an expiration date. The main difference is that virtual credit cards are digital and can only be used for online payments and purchases, money cannot be withdrawn from them.

Midas works in 3 simple steps:
Open Midas and add your mobile money number and account details
Tap "Create a card" to create a new virtual card and fund it with the money existing in your mobile money wallet
Use the virtual card anywhere online for all your purchases and subscriptions
Midas virtual credit card is a supported payment method across different platforms
Enter amount you would like to deposit?
